description:
Tetris Attack is a frantic rising blocks puzzle game. Match 3 or more same-colored panels in a row horizontally or vertically to clear them.
Match 4 or more simultaneously for a Combo. Match more panels after the previous ones clear out for a Chain.
In Stage Clear, each round has a set of successive stages.
In Puzzle, all panels in each board must be fully cleared out using limited moves.
In Vs, perform Chains and Combos to attack.

0.0.1.description: This version has the Stage Clear rounds shuffled as single items. Round 6 leads to Last Stage unless it's the first round.
0.0.1.title: v0.0.1

0.0.2.description:
Added 6 modes of progression for Stage Clear mode
Added placeholder filler items; they do absolutely nothing but will be replaced later
Added deathlink; not completely tested, may softlock

Instructions [here](https://github.com/AgStarRay/TetrisAttackAP/blob/main/README.md)

.apworld was made in 0.6.0, but should still work in 0.5.1
0.0.2.title: v0.0.2

0.0.3.description:
- Added the Stage Clear Special Stage Trap, which triggers the appearance of the Special Stage that appears after round 3 in vanilla
  - When obtained, you are forced to do the encounter until you either win or lose it
- Added options to multiply Bowser's HP in Stage Clear's Special Stage and Last Stage
- Improved SNI performance
- Added SNI communication for already collected locations so that the AP icon disappears, and the game can skip stages/puzzles when appropriate
- SNI communication now also operates in the mode results state, although Deathlink stays inactive
- Locally cleared stages are now marked on the menu

Instructions [here](https://github.com/AgStarRay/TetrisAttackAP/blob/main/README.md)

.apworld was made in 0.6.0, but should still work in 0.5.1
0.0.3.title: v0.0.3

0.1.0.description:
- Made Bowser turn red earlier in the special stages when his max HP is only 100
- Added Puzzles 1-01 to 6-10
- Stage Clear Last Stage Clear is now an included location when there are multiple goals
- Maximum number of locations has increased to 133
- Fixed the logic for Special locations accessibility

Instructions [here](https://github.com/AgStarRay/TetrisAttackAP/blob/main/README.md)

.apworld was made in 0.6.2, but should still work in 0.6.1
0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

0.1.1.description:
Hotfix for Stage Clear's stage skipping logic which was looking at the next round, making certain situations unable to progress

Installation instructions [here](https://github.com/AgStarRay/TetrisAttackAP/blob/main/README.md)
.apworld was made in 0.6.2, but should still work in 0.6.1
0.1.1.title: v0.1.1

0.2.0.description:
- Added Secret Puzzles 1-01 to 6-10
- Replaced the Placeholder Filler item with score items for Stage Clear; SNI will send score bundles that add to your saved total score
- Maximum number of locations has increased to 199

Installation instructions [here](https://github.com/AgStarRay/TetrisAttackAP/blob/main/README.md)
.apworld was made in 0.6.2, but should still work in 0.6.1
0.2.0.title: v0.2.0

0.2.0_01.description:
Hotfix for having too many copies of a progressive item. Should just print a message about the problem instead of causing SNI to disconnect.

Installation instructions [here](https://github.com/AgStarRay/TetrisAttackAP/blob/main/README.md)
0.2.0_01.title: v0.2.0_01

0.3.0.description:
- Renamed Secret puzzles to Extra puzzles
- Added Vs
- Added a header tracker in the main menu for each mode
- Fixed the demo sequence consuming pending deathlink events
- Passwords are no longer displayed anywhere
- Moved some variables out of SRAM to trigger emulator autosave less often, therefore lowering the number of stutters
- Fixed some of the menu graphics
- Maximum number of locations has increased to 220

Installation instructions [here](https://github.com/AgStarRay/TetrisAttackAP/blob/main/README.md)
0.3.0.title: v0.3.0

0.4.0.description:
- Shock panels can now appear in Stage Clear if the player has cleared less than what they received; match 3 or more to send their containing items; the game also spawns in 2 extra panels to make sure they're always clearable
  - Multipliers can be used to multiply the number of shock panels and the number of shock panels required per item; up to 100 items can be added
- Game now puts certain Archipelago messages on-screen
- Added an option to disable music, as well as an option to only disable the menu music
- AP sprites and X markers now appear next to each mode that needs to be goaled
  - The LS marker in the SC tracker and the goal stage goal difficulty in the VS selector display a ! if the item was collected but the stage was not cleared
- Made the apworld properly backward compatible with seeds generated in older versions
- Made the SNI client log some of the reasons why it refuses to connect
- Fixed goaling too early when the items within the goal checks are collected
- Fixed a bug where SNI stops interacting with the game if the game doesn't react to a new item or no items have been received yet
- Fixed several SNI corruption problems by checking if connected to the multiworld
- Regions that are part of excluded modes are not created anymore
- Added some checks to prevent an invalid set of options such as a Stage Clear starter pack when the Stage Clear mode is not included

Installation instructions [here](https://github.com/AgStarRay/TetrisAttackAP/blob/main/README.md)
0.4.0.title: v0.4.0

0.4.1.description:
Fix for Versus where no goal is selected but the difficulty is locked to the "goal difficulty". This is now assumed to be Easy.

Installation instructions [here](https://github.com/AgStarRay/TetrisAttackAP/blob/main/README.md)
0.4.1.title: v0.4.1

0.4.2.description:
- Manifest file has been added to the .apworld
- Fixed a problem with the Vs. Two Stages starter pack which accidentally granted Puzzle Level 6 unlocks if Puzzle mode was included
- .apworld version is now displayed on the title screen and main menu

Installation instructions [here](https://github.com/AgStarRay/TetrisAttackAP/blob/main/README.md)
0.4.2.title: v0.4.2

0.4.2_01.description:
- Fixed Stage Clear special stages not being added to the pool and being substituted with other filler items

Installation instructions [here](https://github.com/AgStarRay/TetrisAttackAP/blob/main/README.md)
0.4.2_01.title: v0.4.2_01
